name: cloudinary
description: Cloudinary Model Context Protocol Server to upload media to Cloudinary and get back the media link and details.

examples.title: Upload an Image
examples.description: This example demonstrates how to upload an image to Cloudinary.
examples.prompt: use_mcp_tool({ server_name: 'cloudinary', tool_name: 'upload', arguments: { file: 'path/to/image.jpg', resource_type: 'image', public_id: 'my-custom-id' }});
